CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C picks teapot out of pile of dishes
C holds spoon out to M
C sees another spoon and hands to M
C visually searches and finds plate , puts by M
C pours with teapot into many cups
M points at place near her
C starts to pick up tray
C pours from teapot in cup
C looks up at M; smiles
M takes toys out of play+house
C picks up plate and looks up at M
C points in book she has open in front of her
C closes book; discards a second; opens a third
C pushes third book at M; opens second
M puts her opened book close to C
M has a little trouble separating pages to turn
